actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the exclusion for amounts received under qualified group legal services plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the exclusion from gross income of amounts received under qualified group legal services plans.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the exclusion for amounts received under qualified group legal services plans.
